body:
without this patch, both url download `html`'s on macOS instead of tarbals.

tested on macOS with gcc6.1

@alalazo ping.
- [x] fix missing `$ nm -g libsatlas.dylib | grep _dggsvd_` which should be there.

It looks like `Lapack@3.6.0` deprecated `dggsvd` http://www.netlib.org/lapack/explore-html/dir_15e3bf8ae7662f502dfe98208b074c77.html , however `Trilinos` still needs it, but hopefully will fix it soon https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/issues/480
title: atlas: fix urls and shared libs
